title: Custom skins
body: Can League of Legeds players use custom skins,is it bannable?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: We don't support modifying skins or any third party programs, so doing it is at your own risk.  Per our[ third party article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) we aren't banning for it now, but that can change in the future.  We also can't offer support if you run into issues or malicious files that might be hiding in whatever you download.  Be wary!
